Episodes.Title: Bigtime
Episodes.Plot: Carrie and Al?s reputation for closing cases results in an offer to join the Major Crimes Section of the NYPD.  But when their first case ? a high-profile child kidnapping ? hits close to home for Carrie, it leaves her wondering if a move from Queens to Manhattan is what?s best for her.
Episodes.GuestStars: Andrew McCarthy, Bianca Amato, Ella Rubin, John Scurti, Danny Johnson

Episodes.Title: Incognito
Episodes.Plot: Carrie goes undercover with a team of bank robbers when The Major Crimes Section gets a lead on the gang?s leader, a notorious thief who rarely shows his face.
Episodes.GuestStars: Sendhil Ramamurthy, William Jackson Harper, Terry Serpico, Erin Cummings

Episodes.Title: Day of the Jackie
Episodes.Plot: Carrie and Al are unable to discern why a businessman was murdered in his hotel room until it?s discovered that his death was collateral damage in a larger plot to assassinate a diplomat.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Robert Farrior, James Hindman, Annika Boras, Steven Ogg

Episodes.Title: Memory Kings
Episodes.Plot: When the scientist who helped Carrie understand her memory abilities is murdered, she must track down other people with the same skill in the hopes that one of them holds the key to finding the killer.
Episodes.GuestStars: Mark Nelson, Stephen Kunken, Yvonna Kopacz-Wright, Phyllis Somerville, Robert Bogue, Sherry Boone

Episodes.Title: Past Tense
Episodes.Plot: Carrie and Al?s latest case ? the murder of an Afghani cab driver ? has the potential to turn into a matter of national security when it?s discovered that the victim was a government informant.
Episodes.GuestStars: Brian J. Smith, Marjan Neshat, Eyas Younis, Michael Shulman, Baylen Thomas

Episodes.Title: Line Up or Shut Up
Episodes.Plot: When a young man is found dead in an expensive sports car he was delivering to a diplomat, each clue leads Carrie and Al to yet another possible motive for the murder.
Episodes.GuestStars: Makenzie Leigh, Dennis Christopher, Vito D'Ambrosio, Olivia Birkelund, Ben Becher, Ilene Kristen, Dale Soules, Angel L. Caban, Juan Castano, Peter Allas, Tommy Walker, Jonathan Hova, Candice Bryant

Episodes.Title: Maps & Legends
Episodes.Plot: The murder of an urban explorer leads Carrie and Al to not only search for the killer, but to pick up the trail of clues the victim was following on the hunt for a treasure supposedly hidden under the streets of New York.

Episodes.Title: Till Death
Episodes.Plot: After a wealthy couple is murdered, Carrie and Al pose as a married couple to lure in the killer, who Al believes is linked to a series of unsolved homicides he once investigated.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jeremy Shamos, Elizabeth Alderfer, Larry Pine, Otto Sanchez, Brette Taylor

Episodes.Title: Flesh and Blood
Episodes.Plot: Carrie catches a deadly assassin who has eluded her before, but must put her personal vendetta aside when it?s revealed that the woman has vital information to prevent a terrorist attack on New York City.
Episodes.GuestStars: Annika Boras, Alex Ziwak, Victor Slezak, Jamie Jackson, Jeff Talbott

Episodes.Title: Manhunt
Episodes.Plot: The murder of a prominent lawyer leads Carrie and Al to reexamine a rape case that moved Manhattan thirteen years before. Soon, they realize that the case was not as clear cut as it was portrayed by the media, and an innocent man may have been wrongfully convicted.
Episodes.GuestStars: Purva Bedi, Sean Cullen, Chris Chalk, Sepideh Moafi, Ben Cole, Adriane Lenox, Franky G

Episodes.Title: East of Islip
Episodes.Plot: A murdered body washes ashore in the Hamptons, and Carrie and Al's boss offers them a "paid vacation" in his beautiful Southampton cottage, in order to help local law enforcement find the killer, who may or may not be related to a previous serial killer.
Episodes.GuestStars: John Bedford Lloyd, Aaron Dean Eisenberg, Joseph Sikora, Brian McElhaney, Wayne Knight

Episodes.Title: Omega Hour
Episodes.Plot: When Carrie and Elliott are attending a party sponsored by the mayor, a group of criminals seizes control of the building, and demand a hefty ransom. It is up to Carrie to thwart their plans by playing from the Die Hard book.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kelly AuCoin, Frankie Faison, Nick Chinlund, Britt Lower

Episodes.Title: Reunion
Episodes.Plot: Carrie's high school reunion is suddenly cut short when an alum shows up dead. Carrie has to remember back 22 years to understand the events that led to this crime.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jessica Phillips, David Furr, Chris Bowers, Katherine McNamara, Amy Wilson
